title: 1933 RRPC Babe Ruth - Yankees at Washington Postcard
author: pencil1974

posts.post_title: 1933 RRPC Babe Ruth - Yankees at Washington Postcard
posts.post_content:
No longer available.

Great RRPC of Ruth walking his war stick coming back from batting practice. Date stamp on the back is from 1933 June 9th. Washington and the Yanks had played a double header about a week before this was sent so I would have to assume that is what this is from.

Back reads:
The Babe in person also Ruffing looking at you.

Size is 3 7/8" x 5 7/16"
